roleset.name: tell a little joke

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Members of the media have quipped that those who work at Taiwan 's Warner Music can thank two Singaporeans , Sun and her producer Li , for any bonuses they made last year .

propbank.arg: that those who work at Taiwan 's Warner Music can thank two Singaporeans , Sun and her producer Li , for any bonuses they made last year

roleset.note: QUIP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'quip' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with say. (from quip.01-v predicate notes)
